item.title: Looking for a summer 2020 internship
item.description: After 5 years of professional experience in official statistics, I am back in school to complete my training to become a Senior Officer for the French National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies (INSEE), after recently passing the internal competitive exam. I am looking for a 10-12-week summer internship in Data Science starting in June 2020 to improve and further develop my knowledge in IT implementation of statistical methods and tools.
